titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY DRUG REGIMEN MODIFICATION INDICATOR (DOSE REDUCTION) - Description

div.p: SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY DRUG REGIMEN MODIFICATION INDICATOR (DOSE REDUCTION) Â is the same as attribute SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY DRUG REGIMEN MODIFICATION INDICATOR FOR DOSE REDUCTION.
